name: Сool mazes 3d app. Labyrinth games free puzzles.
name_original: Сool mazes 3d app. Labyrinth games free puzzles.
description:
Classic maze 3d puzzle game.
Find the only way out in a variety of mazes!
Just swipe your finger and guide the ball through the walls to find a way out and escape the labyrinth.
Maze 3d Features:
- Easy and Hard mazes / labyrinths for kids and adults
- Different sizes of labyrinths for varies challenges.
- Puzzles(Maze) range from easy mazes to much harder and advanced labyrinths

Maze is nice game for everyone. Enjoy the game with fun and don't forget to share with your friends and family members.
